commenter_b: Republican presidential candidate @username has admitted to lying about his application and acceptance to the U.S. Military Academy at West Point, Politico reported on Friday. The retired neurosurgeon and current GOP frontrunner has been using the story as a central point of his personal life during his campaign.
commenter_a: But its just been confirmed that you lied about West Point. You're done in my book. Before that, I supported you.
